lead_paragraph: A bus carrying amateur soccer players and fans plunged into a river after careening off a bridge in eastern Mexico, leaving at least 21 people dead, the authorities said.
snippet: A bus carrying amateur soccer players and fans plunged into a river after careening off a bridge in eastern Mexico, leaving at least 21 people dead, the authorities said.
abstract: Bus careens off bridge and lands in river in Veracruz, Mexico, killing at least 21 amateur soccer players and fans.
